0011100011001010 0100001100000001 1 -> sum: 0111101111001100, cout: 0
1000110110011011 0101101001010010 0 -> sum: 1110011111101101, cout: 0
1010111110000101 0101000100001101 1 -> sum: 0000000010010011, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
